thread.title: VIDEO & PHOTOS: Scouting For Girls play free gig in Southampton
thread.title_full: VIDEO & PHOTOS: Scouting For Girls play free gig in Southampton

title: VIDEO & PHOTOS: Scouting For Girls play free gig in Southampton
text:
Scouting for Girls at HMV - in pictures >> 
They performed live and signed copies of their new album Still Thinking About You, at the HMV store in Above Bar Street 
A return to the immaculate pop of their triple-platinum number one debut album but with a fresh, more mature sound, the album includes Christmas In The Air (Tonight), a seasonal smash in waiting. 
Frontman Roy Stride called it the ultimate Scouting For Girls record. Share article 
The pop rockers, who formed in 2005, have been nominated for four Brit Awards and one Ivor Novello Award. They are best known for the hits She’s So Lovely and Elvis Ain’t Dead. 
The played for around 30 minutes in the store, before posing for photos with the fans who had queued up to see them. Related links
